channel.title: Pads & Cushions – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Shin Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Sleeve with 3 mm gel polymer soft cushion pads moulded at the shin, protecting it from abrasion, friction, and pinching when practicing sports
  • Used under the socks with the pad either in contact to the skin or facing the sock
  • Washable and reusable

The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads are soft to the touch with a hypoallergenic self adhesive backing to ensure they are fastened securely in the proper position. Ideal for pain under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. Diabetics and those with poor blood circulation should always seek professional medical advice before trying.

  • Ideal for relieving the burning sensation under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. The product provides excellent pressure relief and redistributes the impact on the heel
  • Low profile ergonomic design makes these a good option for use in any footwear, including open toe sandals, court shoes, boots, high heels or women's shoes with a narrow fit.
  • Reduce discomfort from sore, tired feet, heel pain, heel spurs, blisters, warts, etc.
  • One size fits all. Heel pads measure 3" x 2". Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing keeps pads in place.
  • Sold in pairs. Washable and reusable. Allow to dry naturally.

The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: HotShotz Portable Heating Pad
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Never suffer the pains of cold or soreness again! Introducing HotShotz, the latest addition to the AT Surgical family of products. HotShotz are an incredible new heating pad that eliminates the wait time between needing heat and having it. With HotShotz you will always have a source of heat at the ready whether you need it to reduce stiffness & soreness or keep your hands warm in the long winter months. Instructions: https://youtu.be/6mrCihv7wY4

The post HotShotz Portable Heating Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Heats up instantly!
  • Indoors: Great for Massage Therapy, Physical Therapy, Neck Pain, Back Pain, Joints, Sore Muscles, Cramps, Sports injuries, Poor Circulation, Arthritis and more
  • Outdoors: Stay warm while Camping, Hunting, fishing, Hiking, Skiing, Snowboarding, skating, Motorcycling, Sporting Events, Scuba Diving and more
  • Lasts approximately two hours
  • Portable

 

The post HotShotz Portable Heating Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Velcro¬Æ Waist Incontinence Pants for adults are a unisex vinyl waterproof shell lined with brush polyester on the interior that slips over incontinence briefs, liners and pads or adult diapers. Great for those seeking solutions to manage incontinence. Incontinence pants act as a barrier that offer an added layer of protection from leaks or accidents, giving the wearer greater confidence and peace of mind.

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The elastic waistband, adjustable Velcro¬Æ closure means these are a snap to pull on
  • Elastic bands are covered with brush polyester to prevent irritation to sensitive skin
  • The generous fit makes these especially comfortable
  • Comes in White or Blue fabric
  • Durable, washable and reusable
  • Hang or lay flat – avoid heat exposure. Do not machine dry or iron

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: :Multi-use Wedge/Positioning Pillow,Keeping You Comfortable While Reading, Working On Laptop, Or Watching Tv
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This cervical roll provides neck support while sleeping on a feather or fiberfill pillow. Place it along the border of the pillow inside the pillowcase,…

The post :Multi-use Wedge/Positioning Pillow,Keeping You Comfortable While Reading, Working On Laptop, Or Watching Tv appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This cervical roll provides neck support while sleeping on a feather or fiberfill pillow. Place it along the border of the pillow inside the pillowcase, either on top of the pillow or just in front, depending how much neck support is comfortable. People suffering from discomfort in their neck/upper back would also benefit from regular use of a bakrol while sitting.Memory foam support pillow will stimulate blood circulation,eliminate muscle tension and reduce restlessness while you sleep,end the neck pain sufferers. This would be your wise choice.Round roll design absolutely conforms to your neck curve, works well for back pain relief.The comfortable pillow supports your head and neck and will greatly improve your driving experience. Also, it is a great napping pillow on long trips.
Memory foam softens in reaction to body heat, allowing it to mold to a warm body in a few minutes. It will recover quickly after use.With a compact design, wherever you go, you can take the light neck and back pillow with you.The removable satin pillowcase is machine-washable, to keep the pillow clean.

Features:

  • Neck support pillow that slides into pillowcase
  • Constructed of low density foam with removable, washable cover
  • Promotes good posture and natural sleeping habits
  • Alleviates and prevents neck and back pain
  • Memory foam support pillow will stimulate blood circulation,eliminate muscle tension and reduce restlessness while you sleep,end the neck pain sufferers. This would be your wise choice.
  • Round roll design absolutely conforms to your neck curve, works well for back pain relief.
  • The comfortable pillow supports your head and neck and will greatly improve your driving experience. Also, it is a great napping pillow on long trips.
  • Memory foam softens in reaction to body heat, allowing it to mold to a warm body in a few minutes. It will recover quickly after use.
  • With a compact design, wherever you go, you can take the light neck and back pillow with you.
  • The removable satin pillowcase is machine-washable, to keep the pillow clean.

Specification:

  • Gender: Unisex.
  • Condition:A brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item

item.title: SLEEPING COLLAR ULTRA LIGHT-WEIGHT AND COMPACT – IDEAL FOR TRAVEL WITH PAIN RELIEF AND LIGHT WEIGHT.
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Full support travel pillow keeps your head and neck in proper alignment allowing you to relax and helps prevent stiff neck and shoulders. Memory foam…

The post SLEEPING COLLAR ULTRA LIGHT-WEIGHT AND COMPACT – IDEAL FOR TRAVEL WITH PAIN RELIEF AND LIGHT WEIGHT. appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Full support travel pillow keeps your head and neck in proper alignment allowing you to relax and helps prevent stiff neck and shoulders. Memory foam and washable cover. Ultra light-weight and compact. Ideal for travel. Featured as “Best Travel Pillow” by Group World Travel Magazine and in the Daily Mail feature “You Never Knew You Needed”,it Keeps head and neck in proper alignment allowing relaxation and preventing soreness,it is made with washable cover made with soft and cool wicking fabric.It is Ultra light-weight and compact – Ideal for travel.You can easily use it when you travel for some place.It reduce your neck pain and give a cozy feelings at cold.

Features:

  • Neck support pillow that slides into pillowcase
  • Constructed of low density foam with removable, washable cover
  • Promotes good posture and natural sleeping habits
  • Alleviates and prevents neck and back pain
  • Memory foam support pillow will stimulate blood circulation,eliminate muscle tension and reduce restlessness while you sleep,end the neck pain sufferers. This would be your wise choice.
  • Round roll design absolutely conforms to your neck curve, works well for back pain relief.
  • The comfortable pillow supports your head and neck and will greatly improve your driving experience. Also, it is a great napping pillow on long trips.
  • full support travel pillow with memory foam
  • proper alignment – keeps head and neck in proper alignment allowing relaxation and preventing soreness
  • washable cover made with soft and cool wicking fabric
  • carry case for convenience and cleanliness. ultra lightweight and compact – ideal for travel
  • Ultra lightweight and compact which is Ideal for travel
  • carrying case for convenience and cleanliness.

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Shin and Achilles Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Achilles & Shin Gel Padding Sock is built to give you the most comfortable skiing and skating experience possible. The fabric is elastic, soft, and thin, taking less space inside the the boot and providing a highly breathable environment. Silicone padding around the tibia prevents discomfort that is commonly caused by ski and skate boots.

The post Shin and Achilles Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• One per order
  • Toeless sock with 2mm gel polymer soft cushion pads molded to at both sides the tibia and Achilles, protecting them from abrasion, friction, and pinching when practicing sports
  • Specially indicated for ski and skate boots
  • Used under the socks with the pad either in contact to the skin or facing the sock
  • Washable and reusable
  • Two sizes

Size

U.S. Shoe Size

Euro Shoe Size

UK Shoe Size

Calf Circumference (Largest part of the calf)
S 4 – 8.5 34-37 2-4.5 11″-14.5″ (18-26.5 cm)
L 8.5 – 13 42-45 8-10.5 14.5″-18″ (37-45.5 cm)

 

Size
